Name: OpenSystems
Author: OpenSystems - support@opensystems.com
Description: This solution integrates OpenSystems Logs-API with Microsoft Sentinel, enabling customers to ingest security logs and leverage them for threat detection and response. It includes parsers to normalize the data and supports various security monitoring use cases.
WorkbookBladeDescription: This solution does not currently include workbooks.
AnalyticalRuleBladeDescription: This solution does not currently include analytic rules.

PlaybooksBladeDescription: This solution does not currently include playbooks.
